trans-unit.source: White Papers on Azure
trans-unit.target: White Papers on Azure

trans-unit.source: The white papers listed below provide additional views and perspectives on Azure services.
trans-unit.target: The white papers listed below provide additional views and perspectives on Azure services.

trans-unit.source: (in order of popularity)
trans-unit.target: (in order of popularity)

trans-unit.source: Security Best Practices For Developing Azure Applications
trans-unit.target: Security Best Practices For Developing Azure Applications

trans-unit.source: This paper focuses on the security challenges and recommended approaches to design and develop more secure applications for Microsoft's Azure platform.
trans-unit.target: This paper focuses on the security challenges and recommended approaches to design and develop more secure applications for Microsoft's Azure platform.

trans-unit.source: Azure Security Overview
trans-unit.target: Azure Security Overview

trans-unit.source: This paper describes the array of controls implemented within Azure, so customers can determine if these capabilities and controls are suitable for their unique requirements.
trans-unit.target: This paper describes the array of controls implemented within Azure, so customers can determine if these capabilities and controls are suitable for their unique requirements.

trans-unit.source: Single Sign-On from Active Directory to an Azure Application Whitepaper
trans-unit.target: Single Sign-On from Active Directory to an Azure Application Whitepaper

trans-unit.source: This paper contains step-by-step instructions for using Windows Identity Foundation, Azure, and Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) 2.0 for achieving SSO across WEB applications that are deployed both on premises and in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: This paper contains step-by-step instructions for using Windows Identity Foundation, Azure, and Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) 2.0 for achieving SSO across WEB applications that are deployed both on premises and in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Azure Table - Programming Table Storage
trans-unit.target: Azure Table - Programming Table Storage

trans-unit.source: This paper describes Azure Table, which is the structured storage provided by the Azure platform.
trans-unit.target: This paper describes Azure Table, which is the structured storage provided by the Azure platform.

trans-unit.source: It supports massively scalable tables in the cloud, which can contain billions of entities and terabytes of data.
trans-unit.target: It supports massively scalable tables in the cloud, which can contain billions of entities and terabytes of data.

trans-unit.source: A Developer's Guide to Service Bus for the Azure AppFabric
trans-unit.target: A Developer's Guide to Service Bus for the Azure AppFabric

trans-unit.source: This paper focuses on how you can use the Service Bus to overcome some of the most common Internet connectivity challenges inherent in today's world.
trans-unit.target: This paper focuses on how you can use the Service Bus to overcome some of the most common Internet connectivity challenges inherent in today's world.

trans-unit.source: Azure Queue - Programming Queue Storage
trans-unit.target: Azure Queue - Programming Queue Storage

trans-unit.source: This paper describes Azure Queue, and how to use it to provide a reliable message delivery mechanism.
trans-unit.target: This paper describes Azure Queue, and how to use it to provide a reliable message delivery mechanism.

trans-unit.source: Azure Drive Whitepaper - Using a Durable Drive for your NTFS Cloud Applications
trans-unit.target: Azure Drive Whitepaper - Using a Durable Drive for your NTFS Cloud Applications

trans-unit.source: This paper describes Azure Drive, and how to use it to provide durable NTFS volumes for Azure applications.
trans-unit.target: This paper describes Azure Drive, and how to use it to provide durable NTFS volumes for Azure applications.

trans-unit.source: Introducing Azure
trans-unit.target: Introducing Azure

trans-unit.source: This paper introduces Azure, Microsoft's cloud platform that allows developers to run applications and store data on virtual machines in an internet-accessible data center.
trans-unit.target: This paper introduces Azure, Microsoft's cloud platform that allows developers to run applications and store data on virtual machines in an internet-accessible data center.

trans-unit.source: Azure Blob - Programming Blob Storage
trans-unit.target: Azure Blob - Programming Blob Storage

trans-unit.source: This paper describes Azure Blob, and how to use it to enable applications to store large objects, up to 50GB each, in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: This paper describes Azure Blob, and how to use it to enable applications to store large objects, up to 50GB each, in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: The Azure Programming Model
trans-unit.target: The Azure Programming Model

trans-unit.source: This paper discusses the benefits of Platform as a Service cloud offering and how it is implemented within Azure.
trans-unit.target: This paper discusses the benefits of Platform as a Service cloud offering and how it is implemented within Azure.

trans-unit.source: Similarities and Differences - SQL Azure vs. SQL Server
trans-unit.target: Similarities and Differences - SQL Azure vs. SQL Server

trans-unit.source: This paper highlights the similaries and differences between SQL Azure and SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: This paper highlights the similaries and differences between SQL Azure and SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: It also covers the benefits of using SQL Azure as a database service in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: It also covers the benefits of using SQL Azure as a database service in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: IT as a Service
trans-unit.target: IT as a Service

trans-unit.source: This paper discusses how Azure complements Windows Server, and how together, they allow enterprises, regional service providers, and Microsoft itself to deliver applications across private and public clouds with a consistent identity, management, and application architecture.
trans-unit.target: This paper discusses how Azure complements Windows Server, and how together, they allow enterprises, regional service providers, and Microsoft itself to deliver applications across private and public clouds with a consistent identity, management, and application architecture.

trans-unit.source: Security Guidelines for SQL Azure
trans-unit.target: Security Guidelines for SQL Azure

trans-unit.source: This paper provides an overview of security guidelines for customers who connect to SQL Azure Database, and who build secure applications on SQL Azure.
trans-unit.target: This paper provides an overview of security guidelines for customers who connect to SQL Azure Database, and who build secure applications on SQL Azure.

trans-unit.source: An Introduction to Azure AppFabric for Developers
trans-unit.target: An Introduction to Azure AppFabric for Developers

trans-unit.source: This paper provides a quick introduction to Azure Platform AppFabric, which includes Service Bus and Access Control and provides common building blocks required by .NET applications when extending their functionality to the cloud, and specifically, the Azure platform.
trans-unit.target: This paper provides a quick introduction to Azure Platform AppFabric, which includes Service Bus and Access Control and provides common building blocks required by .NET applications when extending their functionality to the cloud, and specifically, the Azure platform.

trans-unit.source: Azure and ISVs - A Guide for Decision Makers
trans-unit.target: Azure and ISVs - A Guide for Decision Makers

trans-unit.source: This paper discusses how using the cloud has the potential to increase an ISV's revenues and decrease its costs.
trans-unit.target: This paper discusses how using the cloud has the potential to increase an ISV's revenues and decrease its costs.

trans-unit.source: Cloud Optimization - A framework for making business decisions about cloud computing
trans-unit.target: Cloud Optimization - A framework for making business decisions about cloud computing

trans-unit.source: This paper discusses how cloud computing provides organizations with new ways to deploy and maintain enterprise applications - allowing for greater flexibility and reduced complexity.
trans-unit.target: This paper discusses how cloud computing provides organizations with new ways to deploy and maintain enterprise applications - allowing for greater flexibility and reduced complexity.

trans-unit.source: Azure AppFabric Overview
trans-unit.target: Azure AppFabric Overview

trans-unit.source: This paper introduces Azure AppFabric, a comprehensive cloud middleware platform for developing, deploying, and managing applications on the Azure platform.
trans-unit.target: This paper introduces Azure AppFabric, a comprehensive cloud middleware platform for developing, deploying, and managing applications on the Azure platform.

trans-unit.source: Cloud Economics
trans-unit.target: Cloud Economics

trans-unit.source: This paper assesses the economics of the cloud by using in-depth modeling, and then uses this framework to better understand the long-term IT landscape.
trans-unit.target: This paper assesses the economics of the cloud by using in-depth modeling, and then uses this framework to better understand the long-term IT landscape.

trans-unit.source: System Integrator Whitepaper
trans-unit.target: System Integrator Whitepaper

trans-unit.source: This paper describes how Microsoft system integrator partners are using Azure to develop applications and services that are quick to deploy, easy to manage, readily scalable, and competitively priced.
trans-unit.target: This paper describes how Microsoft system integrator partners are using Azure to develop applications and services that are quick to deploy, easy to manage, readily scalable, and competitively priced.

trans-unit.source: Cloud Platforms for Business Leaders
trans-unit.target: Cloud Platforms for Business Leaders

trans-unit.source: This paper looks at the benefits and the risks of cloud platforms from a business perspective.
trans-unit.target: This paper looks at the benefits and the risks of cloud platforms from a business perspective.

trans-unit.source: To make good decisions, you need to appreciate both.
trans-unit.target: To make good decisions, you need to appreciate both.

trans-unit.source: Overview of Microsoft SQL Azure
trans-unit.target: Overview of Microsoft SQL Azure

trans-unit.source: This paper describes how SQL Azure provides a robust and cost-effect solution for building applications on large or shared data sets, providing on-demand scalable data storage, and augmenting on-premise data infrastructure with low-cost, rapidly provisioned cloud-based storage.
trans-unit.target: This paper describes how SQL Azure provides a robust and cost-effect solution for building applications on large or shared data sets, providing on-demand scalable data storage, and augmenting on-premise data infrastructure with low-cost, rapidly provisioned cloud-based storage.

trans-unit.source: Custom IIS Web/Microsoft SQL Server Application Migration Scenario
trans-unit.target: Custom IIS Web/Microsoft SQL Server Application Migration Scenario

trans-unit.source: This paper describes the IIS/SQL Server application architectural pattern and illustrate specific considerations and suggested approaches for migrating applications with this or similar patterns.
trans-unit.target: This paper describes the IIS/SQL Server application architectural pattern and illustrate specific considerations and suggested approaches for migrating applications with this or similar patterns.

trans-unit.source: Custom Web (Rapid Scaling Focus) Application Migration Scenario
trans-unit.target: Custom Web (Rapid Scaling Focus) Application Migration Scenario

trans-unit.source: This paper describes the Custom WEB application (Rapid Scaling) architectural pattern and illustrate specific considerations and suggested approaches for migrating applications with this or similar patterns.
trans-unit.target: This paper describes the Custom WEB application (Rapid Scaling) architectural pattern and illustrate specific considerations and suggested approaches for migrating applications with this or similar patterns.

trans-unit.source: Custom E-Commerce (Elasticity Focus) Application Migration Scenario
trans-unit.target: Custom E-Commerce (Elasticity Focus) Application Migration Scenario

trans-unit.source: This paper describes the Custom E-Commerce Application (Elasticity Focus) architectural pattern and illustrate specific considerations and suggested approaches for migrating applications with this or similar patterns.
trans-unit.target: This paper describes the Custom E-Commerce Application (Elasticity Focus) architectural pattern and illustrate specific considerations and suggested approaches for migrating applications with this or similar patterns.

trans-unit.source: Developing and Deploying with SQL Azure
trans-unit.target: Developing and Deploying with SQL Azure

trans-unit.source: This paper provides guidelines on how to deploy an existing on-premise SQL Server database into SQL Azure.
trans-unit.target: This paper provides guidelines on how to deploy an existing on-premise SQL Server database into SQL Azure.

trans-unit.source: It also discusses best practices related to data migration.
trans-unit.target: It also discusses best practices related to data migration.
